scripts.clean: docker volume ls | grep CLOUD_COMPUTER_ | cut -b 15- | xargs docker volume rm
scripts.ps:long: echo; yarn ps --format 'table {{.Names}}\t{{.Label "namespace"}}\t{{.Label "tier"}}\t{{.Status}}\t{{.Image}}' | awk 'NR<2{print toupper($0);print "";next}{print $0| "sort -k2,2"}'; echo
scripts.ps:pretty: echo; yarn ps --format 'table {{.Names}}\t{{.Label "namespace"}}\t{{.Label "tier"}}\t{{.Status}}' | awk 'NR<2{print toupper($0);print "";next}{print $0| "sort -k3,3"}'; echo
scripts.pull: yarn docker images --format '{{.Repository}}' | xargs -n 1 -P $(cat /proc/cpuinfo | grep processor | wc -l) yarn docker pull
